tag.v: Adding to information for a building on the map as Barina Milpara Lodge. I am the webmaster for Barina Milpara, the organisation that owns the Lodge.

Book using the online booking facility on our website.
Website: http://www.barinalmilpara.com.au Email: Bookings@barina.com.au

The best value family friendly accommodation in Perisher Valley, Barina Milpara Lodge is perfect for a weekend, week-long, or season getaway.
Guests at this comfortable lodge start the day with a continental buffet, followed by a delicious hot breakfa
